result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.ga: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léir
result.orig: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léir
result.html: Chaill mé an t-airgead go léirI lost all the money.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill mé an t-airgead go léirI lost all the money.

result.eng: Not many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ga: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.orig: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.html: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa PharlaimintNot many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ponchtml: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá ḃrí sin ċaill sí a suíoċán sa ṖarlaimintNot many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.

result.eng: She lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ga: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.orig: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eile
result.html: Chaill sí a pas chomh maith le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill sí a pas ċoṁ maiṫ le doiciméid oifigiúla eileShe lost her passport as well as other official documents.

result.eng: I drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ga: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.orig: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.html: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ponchtml: D'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur ċaill mé mo ṁeaḃair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.

result.ga: Chaill sé a mheabhair glan
result.html: Chaill sé a mheabhair glanHe lost his mind completely.
result.ponchtml: Ċaill sé a ṁeaḃair glanHe lost his mind completely.
